race.name: Flanders Legacy Gravel
race.tagline: Belgian Flanders—100km of cobbles and gravel, 1,000m elevation, May rain, cycling legacy.

terrain.surface: 75% gravel, 25% paved roads. Flanders—rolling terrain, cobbles. 1,000 m over 100 km. Belgian cycling legacy. Technical rating: 3/5.

biased_opinion.summary: Flanders Legacy Gravel is Belgian Flanders—100 km, 1,000 m elevation. Founded ~2020. 75% gravel, 25% paved. Flanders—rolling terrain, cobbles. 500-700 riders. Flanders, Belgium. May spring conditions (12-20°C, 35% rain). Affordable entry (€70-€100 / $75-$110). If you want Belgian Flanders cobbles with cycling legacy and affordable entry, this is it. If you need dry weather, skip it. May rain 35%.
biased_opinion.bottom_line: Flanders Legacy Gravel is Belgian Flanders cobbles. 100 km, 1,000 m, May rain 35%. If you want Belgian Flanders cycling legacy with cobbles, this is it. If you need dry weather, skip it. Rain is the challenge. Post-race Belgian beer.

black_pill.title: MAY RAIN (35%) + BELGIAN COBBLES
black_pill.reality: May Belgium = 35% rain. Cold (12-20°C). Belgian cobbles = rough. 10-15% DNF. You'll pay €70-€100 ($75-$110) + international travel. If you need dry weather, this isn't it. If you want Belgian Flanders cobbles with cycling legacy, this is it. Rain is the challenge. Cobbles are rough.
black_pill.expectation_reset: Flanders Legacy Gravel is Belgian Flanders cobbles. May rain 35%, cold, cobbles rough. If you need dry weather, skip it. If you want Belgian Flanders cycling legacy, this is it. Rain is the challenge. Post-race Belgian beer.

logistics.travel_summary: Fly to Brussels (BRU). Rental car or train (50 km, 45-minute drive to Flanders). Region lodging—book early. Day-before packet pickup. Race May. Post-race Belgian beer.
logistics.food_options: Aid stations on course. Post-race party with Belgian beer.

course_description.character: 100 km, 1,000 m. 75% gravel, 25% paved. Flanders—rolling terrain, cobbles. Technical rating: 3/5.

suffering_zones.name: Throughout: Flanders Rolling Terrain
suffering_zones.description: Rolling Flanders. 1,000 m cumulative elevation. Belgian countryside.
suffering_zones.survival_strategy: Moderate gears. Steady pace. Cumulative elevation manageable. 100 km long.

suffering_zones.name: Sections: Belgian Cobbles
suffering_zones.description: Belgian cobbles. Rough. Classic Flanders cycling.
suffering_zones.survival_strategy: 35-40mm tires. Comfort critical. Hold on. Cobbles are rough.

suffering_zones.name: Throughout: May Rain
suffering_zones.survival_strategy: Waterproofs. Layers. Manage cold/wet. Rain likely.

course_description.signature_challenge: 100 km + Belgian cobbles + May rain (35%). Flanders cycling legacy.

history.origin_story: Flanders Legacy Gravel founded ~2020. Flanders, Belgium. 100 km, 500-700 riders. Belgian Flanders cobbles gravel.
history.reputation: Belgian gravel scene. Flanders. Cobbles. Cycling legacy. Well-organized.
